languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}Комм-бусина{/g} оживает.{/n} "На связи Инфернус-мастер. Произошло несколько крупных взрывов по всему кораблю. Каскадным отключением почти по всему судну вышибло освещение, транспортные линии, фильтрацию воздуха и теплоконтроль. Обнаружены множественные очаги возгорания. Все силы Гильдии Инфернус брошены на аварийные работы. Мы спасем корабль, во что бы то ни стало".

{n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} springs to life.{/n} "Infernus Master speaking. There have been several large explosions throughout the ship. A cascading blackout has knocked out lighting, transportation lines, air filtration, and heat control across the entire vessel. Multiple fires detected. All Infernus Guild forces have been deployed for emergency repairs. We will save the ship, no matter the cost."
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}Комм-бусина{/g} оживает.{/n} "На связи Инфернус-мастер. Произошло несколько крупных взрывов по всему кораблю. Каскадным отключением почти по всему судну вышибло освещение, транспортные линии, фильтрацию воздуха и теплоконтроль. Обнаружены множественные очаги возгорания. Все силы Гильдии Инфернус брошены на аварийные работы. Мы спасем корабль, во что бы то ни стало".

languages.text: {n}Tu {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}cuenta de comunicaciones{/g} cobra vida.{/n} «Al habla el maestro de Infernus. Se han producido varias explosiones de gran tamaño por toda la nave. Un apagón en cadena nos ha dejado sin luz, transporte, filtros de aire y control térmico en toda la nave. Detectamos numerosos incendios. El gremio de Infernus al completo ha sido desplegado por toda la nave para ejecutar reparaciones de emergencia. Salvaremos la nave, cueste lo que cueste».
languages.original_text: {n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} springs to life.{/n} "Infernus Master speaking. There have been several large explosions throughout the ship. A cascading blackout has knocked out lighting, transportation lines, air filtration, and heat control across the entire vessel. Multiple fires detected. All Infernus Guild forces have been deployed for emergency repairs. We will save the ship, no matter the cost."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu cuenta de comunicaciones cobra vida.{/n} «Al habla el maestro de Infernus. Se han producido varias explosiones de gran tamaño por toda la nave. Un apagón en cadena nos ha dejado sin luz, transporte, filtros de aire y control térmico en toda la nave. Detectamos numerosos incendios. El gremio de Infernus al completo ha sido desplegado por toda la nave para ejecutar reparaciones de emergencia. Salvaremos la nave, cueste lo que cueste».

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}通信機{/g}からワッと声が聞こえる。{/n}「こちら、インフェルヌス・マスター。船のあちこちで大きな爆発が複数回発生しました。連続して停電が起こり、 船全体の照明、輸送ライン、空気ろ過、温度制御が停止しています。複数の火災を感知。インフェルヌス・ギルドの全隊が、緊急修理に投入されました。どんな犠牲を払ってでも、船を救います」
languages.original_text: {n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} springs to life.{/n} "Infernus Master speaking. There have been several large explosions throughout the ship. A cascading blackout has knocked out lighting, transportation lines, air filtration, and heat control across the entire vessel. Multiple fires detected. All Infernus Guild forces have been deployed for emergency repairs. We will save the ship, no matter the cost."

traits.locale_text: {n}通信機からワッと声が聞こえる。{/n}「こちら、インフェルヌス・マスター。船のあちこちで大きな爆発が複数回発生しました。連続して停電が起こり、 船全体の照明、輸送ライン、空気ろ過、温度制御が停止しています。複数の火災を感知。インフェルヌス・ギルドの全隊が、緊急修理に投入されました。どんな犠牲を払ってでも、船を救います」

languages.text: {n}你的{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}通讯珠{/g}里传来了答复。{/n}“这里是控火大师。整艘船上发生了多次大型爆炸，造成了一连串的停电事故。整艘船的照明线路、运输线路、空气过滤、热控制系统都失灵了。我们探测到多处发生火灾，控火行会所有成员都在进行紧急维修。我们准备不惜一切代价挽救这艘船。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} springs to life.{/n} "Infernus Master speaking. There have been several large explosions throughout the ship. A cascading blackout has knocked out lighting, transportation lines, air filtration, and heat control across the entire vessel. Multiple fires detected. All Infernus Guild forces have been deployed for emergency repairs. We will save the ship, no matter the cost."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的通讯珠里传来了答复。{/n}“这里是控火大师。整艘船上发生了多次大型爆炸，造成了一连串的停电事故。整艘船的照明线路、运输线路、空气过滤、热控制系统都失灵了。我们探测到多处发生火灾，控火行会所有成员都在进行紧急维修。我们准备不惜一切代价挽救这艘船。”

languages.text: {n}Dein {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}Voxstecker{/g} erwacht zum Leben.{/n} "Hier spricht der Infernus-Meister. Es gab auf dem gesamten Schiff mehrere große Explosionen. Ein sich immer weiter ausbreitender Stromausfall hat die Beleuchtung, die Transportlinien, die Luftfilter und die Temperaturkontrolle im gesamten Schiff lahmgelegt. Es gibt mehrere Brände. Sämtliche Truppen der Infernus-Gilden sind mit Notfallreparaturen beschäftigt. Wir werden das Schiff retten. Koste es, was es wolle."
languages.original_text: {n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} springs to life.{/n} "Infernus Master speaking. There have been several large explosions throughout the ship. A cascading blackout has knocked out lighting, transportation lines, air filtration, and heat control across the entire vessel. Multiple fires detected. All Infernus Guild forces have been deployed for emergency repairs. We will save the ship, no matter the cost."

languages.text: {n}Votre {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}communicateur{/g} grésille.{/n} « Ici le maître-infernus. Le vaisseau a été secoué par plusieurs explosions conséquentes. Suite à un enchaînement de pannes, l'éclairage est désormais hors service, de même que les lignes de transport et les systèmes de filtration de l'air et de gestion de la température. Plusieurs départs de feu ont été détectés. Toutes les forces de la guilde infernus ont été déployées pour effectuer des réparations d'urgence. Nous sauverons ce vaisseau, quel qu'en soit le prix. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} springs to life.{/n} "Infernus Master speaking. There have been several large explosions throughout the ship. A cascading blackout has knocked out lighting, transportation lines, air filtration, and heat control across the entire vessel. Multiple fires detected. All Infernus Guild forces have been deployed for emergency repairs. We will save the ship, no matter the cost."

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}Mikro telsizin{/g} çalışmaya başlıyor.{/n} "İtfa Üstadı konuşuyor. Gemide birkaç tane büyük çaplı patlama meydana geldi. Peş peşe gerçekleşen güç kesintileri nedeniyle geminin dört bir yanındaki ışıklandırmalar, nakil hatları, hava filtreleri ve ısı kontrolleri devre dışı kaldı. Çok sayıda yangın tespit edildi. Tüm İtfa Loncası kuvvetleri, acil durum onarımlarını yapmak üzere konuşlandırıldı. Ne pahasına olursa olsun gemiyi kurtaracağız."
languages.original_text: {n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} springs to life.{/n} "Infernus Master speaking. There have been several large explosions throughout the ship.
